text: "I Gotcha" is a 1972 song by soul singer Joe Tex. It was originally intended for King Floyd, instead Tex recorded it himself as a title track to his album of the same name. ==Jimmy Barnes version== In 1991, Australian singer Jimmy Barnes covered I Gotcha for his fifth studio album Soul Deep. It is the leading single from the album. It went to number 6 in Australia and number 27 in New Zealand. ==References== Category:1972 songs Category:Soul songs Category:Jimmy Barnes songs
title: I Gotcha (Joe Tex song)
